whatIsThis.text:
Strichliste is a small program that makes it easier for a group of users to remember, for example, how much they put in a drinks register.

The fastest way to get started with this is to go to the users page and create a user.
whatIsThis.title: What is this?

transaction.send: Who does "{username}" want to send {amount} to?

charge.askForValue: How much would you like to top up your account?

delete.confirm1: Are you sure you want to delete "{username}"?
delete.confirm2: Are you sure you want to delete "{username}"?
delete.confirm3:
Are you sure you want to delete "{username}"? 
This action cannot be undone.

pay.askForValue: How much do you want to pay

transfer.askForValue: How much do you want to transfer?

users.noUsers: There don't seem to be any users.
users.noUsersDescription: You can create a user with the button.
